website_summaries.verdict: A top choice for those looking for a modern, slim-fit bomber jacket design.
pros: Customers love the sleek, slim fit style of this option, as well as its great quality and feel
It gets top marks for having plenty of pockets and being warm and comfortable
cons: a few note the tag faded over time

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket! Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! Looks awesome, fits great. Not as bulky as the "regular fit" flight jacket. However, slim fit is more like tight fit. I'm 6'1", 175 lbs and a large was too tight. I couldn't wear the jacket with a hoodie underneath. XL was perfect. Slim, but not so tight that I couldn't wear a hoodie underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slim vs. Regular Fit
customer_reviews.text: Judging by the other reviews, it appears the small sizes run large and the large sizes run small. I'm 6'4, skinny athletic build, so I ordered an XL in this jacket and the regular fit. Included are images of both. In addition to a very slim fit, this jacket also has shorter sleeves than the regular, which were actually perfect for me. The nylon is extremely high-quality, and blocks the wind well. It's also quite warm. I'll be sticking with the slim and returning the regular.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: 175 5' 10" 16/34 shirt 40 Reg Slim suits Jeans 33/32 A large fits fine if you want it just a little loose
customer_reviews.text: These slim fit are about a size smaller than normal. I usually wear a medium in just about everything. 175 5' 10" 16/34 shirt 40 Reg Slim suits Jeans 33/32 A large fits fine if you want it just a little loose , but still fitted (just enough to pull a slim hoodie and still have it fitted.) The medium, fits sort of tight (if you want that slim look while wearing a t-shirt) You can pull off a hoodie as well, but its going to be kinda tight and it better be a thin hoodie) In a perfect world I would want one of each. Depends on the look and how you want to wear it more.
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4" 115 pounds with a 34 inch chest. I ordered an XS. It fits very well. I used the fit calculator on Alpha's own website. It's not snug on me but is trim. It looks better than my old regular fit MA-1 especially in the arms and shoulders. It's not puffy or baggy on me. It sits just below my belt. The only thing is the sleeves could be half an inch shorter. It causes the cuffs to tunnel inside the sleeves. Other than that it's made well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: This is the best casual jacket in this price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best casual jacket in this price, really! Just buy and you understand that you can wear it for almost all stuff, from classic shoes to sneakers, may wear it when cold and warm! Products from Alpha all are very qualitive (has N3-B Slim Fit for 4 years, yes, guys, it's in perfect state since I bought it). I reccommend it for all my friends (and now it's bad, cause a many of them have already bought them and looks like me). I reccommend this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: MPOne

customer_reviews.title: Order One Size Up At Least
customer_reviews.text: I returned this jacket because it was too small. I wear a medium (US) but this was tiny. I would order a large but I needed something lighter. This Jacket is filled and would be great for cooler weather. I need something I can wear all year round so I ordered the Alpha Industries Men's L-2B Scout instead. I hope it is the same quality, I ordered a size up this time (large).
customer_reviews.author: Darth Barko

customer_reviews.title: While that regular fit jacket was very comfortable in the shoulders
customer_reviews.text: This MA-1 Slim fit (Large) replaced a worn-out MA-1 regular fit jacket (also a large). While that regular fit jacket was very comfortable in the shoulders, it was too roomy in the belly area. This Slim fit jacket is still good in the shoulders but much trimmer around the middle; just right for my physique (34" waist). And it still fits when I wear a hooded sweatshirt underneath. I'm really happy with this purchase and will buy this style again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Worth

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: As a woman, I wasn't sure how this would fit me, but have been very happy with it. This jacket is fantastic and has been my near constant companion both at home and while traveling the road. The quality is great and the black still hasn't faded like it has on my other black coats, and haven't had any issues with the zippers. I like the "Air Force" aesthetic and the inside pockets ares helpful for storing small items, though if I forget to button them sometimes my glasses will fall out. The slim version fits my frame well and isn't too puffy. Hoping to use it for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Bevin

customer_reviews.title: Same quality as in years past
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the slim and received the standard, decided to keep it anyway because I'm lazy and you cant go wrong with this jacket either way. The quality seems to be the same as the one I had in high school way back in the 80s, maybe just a little looser fitting. These are more expensive than other brands but are the only ones I would ever buy, I've lost these jackets in the past but cant recall ever throwing one out. Alpha is still the best
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: The jacket has a nice, slim fit. Sitting close to the body keeps the heavy jacket from looking too bulky. It has a clean, trim look and I have gotten some compliments when wearing it. It probably would not be a sufficient weight for Minnesota or Michigan in January or February, but for those occasional cold days we get here in the California desert during that time period, it is perfect and it would work for those other climates in late fall or early spring.
customer_reviews.author: Robleroy

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, you knew that already. Here is what you may not know, It is borderline too short. I got the sage, I like it, it looks closer to army green to me in person but maybe its the lighting where I am.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, great fit

I'd highly recommend the Slim Fit to anyone who wants a remotely fitted jacket. Disregard reviews that claim it's too short; it's a bomber jacket and not supposed to go past your waist.

customer_reviews.title: Checked previous reviews and was hesitated with size initially. ...

Worth every single buck and finger crossed for long lasting quality tho.

I really can’t zip it up and retain much movement. There’s no way a hoodie can be worn underneath. I don’t really want to go through return process, so I’ll probably keep it. Hopefully this helps someone

customer_reviews.title: Styling

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable

If you like the look of a bomber jacket, but don’t want to look and feel like the dough-boy, then get this slim fit jacket.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slim fit jacket
customer_reviews.text: My measurements: 5'7", 145 lbs, 37" chest, and 30" waist. The small fits like a glove. The fabric does a good job of blocking out the wind and the jacket felt really warm overall (have worn outside in 32F weather so far).. Sleeve length is spot on (hits right at wrist). This jacket is truly slim fit though so if you're a more muscular or bigger guy, you might want to size up.

customer_reviews.title: Buy around two sizes larger than you're used to

customer_reviews.title: Great updated fit to a classic piece
customer_reviews.text: Since I usually buy XL - XXL in jackets because of my broad shoulder, I was worried this Bomber would be too "poofy". But, I had has my eye on this for a few years now and once I say Alpha Industries made a slim fit version, I decided to give it a shot. Slim fit to me still means skinny, but that isn't the case here. The bomber fit just as I had hoped and in some ways even exceeded my expectations. The MA-1 slim fit the perfect autumn casual jacket and a staple piece for any guy's closet.

product_meta.title: Alpha Industries Men's Slim-European Fit MA-1 Flight Jacket
product_meta.description: We've updated our classic ma-1 jacket with a slimmer fit throughout the body and sleeves. Like its counterpart, the ma-1 slim fit has a flight nylon, water-resistant shell with nylon lining and 100 percent polyester fill. The black variation has brass zippers while the other colors have tonal metal zippers. The white variation reverses to a white interior while the rest of the colors have the traditional emergency orange lining. Inspired by the original jackets worn by U.S Air Force and Navy pilots in the 1950’s, the modern cut provides a slim fit.
feature_bullets: Shell: 100% Flight Nylon; Lining: 100% Nylon; Fill: 100% Polyester

100% Flight Nylon: The MA-1 Flight Jacket is constructed with a 100% mid-weight flight nylon shell. Because the jacket is reversible, you can also flaunt the bright orange nylon fabric. Dry clean only.

Bonus Features: This classic flight jacket has a utility pocket on the sleeve with a signature “Remove Before Flight” flag. There are also 2 lower flap pockets and 2 interior welt pockets. The shirred sleeves and knit rib collar, cuffs and waistband give this jacket the authentic bomber look.
Slim Fit: This military-style jacket features a slim fit. The waistband generally falls just above the hip. It fits slimmer in the body and sleeves, giving a modern silhouette of a classic look.
For Intermediate Weather: This bomber jacket features 100% polyester fill, ensuring warmth in intermediate weather. The jacket is also water resistant, making it ideal for light rain or mild snow.

About Alpha Industries: After being commissioned in 1959, Alpha Industries began designing and manufacturing jackets for the U.S. military, protecting soldiers, aviators and sailors from the harsh elements. Today, Alpha Industries has closely maintained the authentic design for civilian fashion, outfitting men and women to realize their potential.
